title: silver LF team
body:
Hey guys,

Im currently s5, looking for a ranked team to play with. I dont mind playing with bronze if you are genuinely looking to improve and i can quite easily play at a high standard in high gold elo teams. I prefer playing top, jung and supp (tanky cc champs) but i cant fill any lane if needed.
Add me, im keen for a trial.

IGN: span
